channel.title: Embrace imperfection!
channel.description: Place for reflexion for software engineering

item.title: Turn an ice-cream cone into a pyramid
item.description: This post talks about the problems related to the ice-cream cone anti pattern and how to transform it into pyramid using Hexagonal architecture.

item.title: Embrace imperfection!
item.description: The first post talks about why we should Embrace Imperfection.
